attributes.action: Re-introduce refundable deposits on glass bottles and jars so that they can be re-used.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To re-introduce compulsary refundable deposits on all glass bottles and jars,whether they are foodstuffs or alcohol containers so that they can be re-used instead of going to landfill sites. eg 20 pence per bottle, like they used to do years ago.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
